name: Null (Noksz)
description:
Story

You are living your life normally, until, because of a glitch in the universe, you are taken to "The Null Forest", where it is the homeland of a reality manipulator.

To get out of this place, you must follow the notes of the ancient wanderers.

Remember, he's not always looking at you

Controls

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Click - Interact

Left Shift - Run

E - See missions

F - Flashlight

Esc - Pause
